title: 31.80 DEFINITIONS.
text:
For the purposes of sections 31.80 to 31.875, the terms defined in this section have the meanings given them.
"Bulk food" means unpackaged and unwrapped food in aggregate containers from which quantities are withdrawn by the consumer, excluding fresh fruits, fresh vegetables, nuts in the shell, and food in salad bars.
"Product module" means a multiuse or single service food contact container designed for customer self-service of bulk food by either direct or indirect means.
